trans-unit.source: Represents the table drawn by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"></xref> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: Representa a tabela desenhada pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid"> </xref> controle em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control displays data in the form of a grid.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle exibe os dados na forma de uma grade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The DataGridTableStyle is a class that represents the drawn grid only.
trans-unit.target: DataGridTableStyle é uma classe que representa a grade desenhado.

trans-unit.source: This grid should not be confused with the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> class, which is a possible source of data for the grid.
trans-unit.target: Essa grade não deve ser confundida com o <xref:System.Data.DataTable>classe, que é uma possível fonte de dados para a grade.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: Instead, the DataGridTableStyle strictly represents the grid as it is painted in the control.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, DataGridTableStyle estritamente representa a grade conforme ele é pintado no controle.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, through the DataGridTableStyle you can control the appearance of the grid for each <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Portanto, por meio de DataGridTableStyle você pode controlar a aparência da grade para cada <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: To specify which DataGridTableStyle is used when displaying data from a particular <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Para especificar quais DataGridTableStyle, é usado quando exibir dados de um determinado <xref:System.Data.DataTable>Defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>para o <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>de <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property contains all the DataGridTableStyle objects used by a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>recuperados por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>propriedade contém todos os objetos DataGridTableStyle usados por um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: The collection can contain as many DataGridTableStyle objects as you need, however the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of each must be unique.
trans-unit.target: A coleção pode conter tantos objetos DataGridTableStyle conforme necessário, no entanto, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>de cada um deve ser exclusivo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: At run time, this allows you to substitute a different DataGridTableStyle for the same data, depending on the user's preference.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de execução, isso permite que você substitua um DataGridTableStyle diferente para os mesmos dados, dependendo da preferência do usuário.

trans-unit.source: To do this: 1.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso: 1.

trans-unit.source: Populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> with DataGridTableStyle objects.
trans-unit.target: Preencher o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>com objetos DataGridTableStyle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: If a DataGridTableStyle exists in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property value equals the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object's <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> property, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is displayed with this DataGridTableStyle.
trans-unit.target: Se existir um DataGridTableStyle no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>cujo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valor da propriedade é igual ao <xref:System.Data.DataTable>do objeto <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>propriedade, o <xref:System.Data.DataTable>é exibida com este DataGridTableStyle.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>

trans-unit.source: If no DataGridTableStyle exists with a matching <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is displayed with the default style for data grid tables.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum DataGridTableStyle existe com uma correspondência <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>, o <xref:System.Data.DataTable>é exibido com o estilo padrão de tabelas de grade de dados.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a different grid style is needed, use the `Item` property to select the appropriate DataGridTableStyle (pass the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property) and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the returned object to a new value.
trans-unit.target: Quando um estilo de diferentes de grade é necessário, use o `Item` propriedade para selecionar DataGridTableStyle apropriado (passar o <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>propriedade) e defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>do objeto retornado para um novo valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A> property to select the desired DataGridTableStyle, and set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>propriedade selecione DataGridTableStyle desejado, e defina seu <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>para a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>de <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.</xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding DataGridTableStyle objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Sempre crie <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objetos e adicioná-los para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>antes de adicionar objetos DataGridTableStyle <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty DataGridTableStyle with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adicionar um DataGridTableStyle vazio com uma validade <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valor à coleção, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objetos são gerados automaticamente para você.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Consequentemente, uma exceção será lançada se você tentar adicionar novos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>objetos com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>valores para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> de duplicados</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: To determine which DataGridTableStyle is currently displayed, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> to return a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar qual DataGridTableStyle no momento é exibida, use as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>Propriedades da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>para retornar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> e</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the data source implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList> interface, you can use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> method to return the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the current table.
trans-unit.target: Se a fonte de dados implementa a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>interface, você pode usar o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A>método para retornar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>da tabela atual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList.GetListName%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypedList>

trans-unit.source: This is shown in the C# code below: ``` private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ``` If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects related through <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects, and the currently displayed <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is a child table, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> will return a string in the form of TableName.RelationName (in the simplest case).
trans-unit.target: Isso é mostrado no código c# a seguir: ``` private void PrintCurrentListName(DataGrid myDataGrid){ CurrencyManager myCM = (CurrencyManager) BindingContext[myDataGrid.DataSource, myDataGrid.DataMember]; IList myList = myCM.List; ITypedList thisList = (ITypedList) myList; Console.WriteLine(thisList.GetListName(null)); } ``` se o <xref:System.Data.DataSet>contém <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objetos relacionados por meio de <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>objetos e exibido no momento <xref:System.Data.DataTable>é uma tabela filho, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>retornará uma cadeia de caracteres na forma de TableName.RelationName (no caso mais simples).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataTable> </xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> is further down in the hierarchy, the string will consist of the parent table's name followed by the necessary <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> values required to reach the table's level.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Data.DataTable>está mais abaixo na hierarquia, a cadeia de caracteres será composto de nome da tabela pai seguido necessários <xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A>valores necessários para alcançar o nível da tabela.</xref:System.Data.DataRelation.RelationName%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: For example, imagine three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects in a hierarchical relationship named (top to bottom) `Regions`, `Customers`, and `Orders`, and two <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects named `RegionsToCustomers` and `CustomersToOrders`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property will return "Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, imagine três <xref:System.Data.DataTable>objetos em uma relação hierárquica chamado (de cima para baixo) `Regions`, `Customers`, e `Orders`e dois <xref:System.Data.DataRelation>objetos nomeados `RegionsToCustomers` e `CustomersToOrders`, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>propriedade retornará "Regions.RegionsToCustomers.CustomersToOrders".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRelation> </xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> will then be "Orders".
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>será "Orders".</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The collection of DataGridTableStyle objects is returned through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de objetos DataGridTableStyle é retornada por meio da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a DataGridTableStyle is displayed, the settings for the DataGridTableStyle will override the settings for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control.
trans-unit.target: Quando um DataGridTableStyle que é exibido, as configurações para DataGridTableStyle substituirão as configurações para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a value is not set for a particular DataGridTableStyle property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control's value will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: Se um valor não for definido para uma determinada propriedade no DataGridTableStyle, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>em vez disso, será usado o valor do controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following list shows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> properties that can be set to override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=fullName> control properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AlternatingBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.BackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ColumnHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridLineStyle%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderForeColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.LinkColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.ReadOnly%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeadersVisible%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.RowHeaderWidth%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionBackColor%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.SelectionForeColor%2A> To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: A lista a seguir mostra o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>propriedades que podem ser definidas para substituir trans-unit.source: To create a DataGridTableStyle that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um DataGridTableStyle que exibe a matriz, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `typename` onde `typename` é substituído pelo nome do tipo de objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: Observe também que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>propriedade diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas; o nome do tipo deve ser exatamente iguais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>propriedade para obter um exemplo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode associar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>a um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: Um recurso do <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>é que ele pode conter objetos de vários tipos, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>só pode ser associado a essa lista quando todos os itens na lista são do mesmo tipo que o primeiro item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que todos os objetos devem ser do mesmo tipo, ou eles devem herdar da classe mesmo como o primeiro item na lista.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o primeiro item em uma lista é uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, o segundo item pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Se, por outro lado, o primeiro item é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>o segundo objeto não pode ser <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound and the objects in the DataGridTableStyle must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>devem ter itens nele quando ele está associado e objetos no DataGridTableStyle devem conter propriedades públicas.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: Vazio <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>resultará em uma grade vazia.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the DataGridTableStyle to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: Ao associar a um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>de DataGridTableStyle para "ArrayList" (o nome do tipo).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> class using the specified value to determine whether the grid table is the default style.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"> </xref> classe usando o valor especificado para determinar se a tabela de grade é o estilo padrão.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify the table as the default; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para especificar a tabela como o padrão. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether sorting is allowed on the grid table when this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"></xref> is used.
trans-unit.target: Indica se a classificação é permitida na grade de tabela quando isso <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle"> </xref> é usado.

trans-unit.source: When the AllowSorting property is set to `true`, a triangle appears in each column header indicating the direction of the sort.
trans-unit.target: Quando a propriedade AllowSorting é definida como `true`, um triângulo aparece em cada cabeçalho de coluna que indica a direção da classificação.

trans-unit.source: The user can click on any column header to sort the grid by that column.
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode clicar em qualquer cabeçalho de coluna para classificar a grade por essa coluna.

trans-unit.source: Clicking the column a second time changes the direction of the sort.
trans-unit.target: Se você clicar uma segunda vez altera a direção da classificação.

trans-unit.source: An exception will be thrown if you attempt to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the collection.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name used to map this table to a specific data source.

trans-unit.source: To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>em uma matriz fortemente tipada de objetos, o tipo de objeto deve conter propriedades públicas.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the MappingName property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>que exibe a matriz, defina a propriedade MappingName como `typename` onde `typename` é substituído pelo nome do tipo de objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Also note that the MappingName property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: Observe também que a propriedade MappingName diferencia maiusculas de minúsculas; o nome do tipo deve ser exatamente iguais.

trans-unit.source: See the MappingName property for an example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte a propriedade MappingName para obter um exemplo.

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode associar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>a um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: Um recurso do <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>é que ele pode conter objetos de vários tipos, mas o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>só pode ser associado a essa lista quando todos os itens na lista são do mesmo tipo que o primeiro item.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: Isso significa que todos os objetos devem ser do mesmo tipo, ou eles devem herdar da classe mesmo como o primeiro item na lista.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o primeiro item em uma lista é uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, o segundo item pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(que herda de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: Se, por outro lado, o primeiro item é um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>o segundo objeto não pode ser <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>devem ter itens nele quando ele está vinculado.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: Vazio <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>resultará em uma grade vazia.</xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the MappingName of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: Ao associar a um <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, defina MappingName do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>para "ArrayList" (o nome do tipo).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>

trans-unit.source: The default is the name of the list managed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for this grid.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é o nome da lista de gerenciados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>para esta grade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager> for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> is set using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>é definida usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingNameChanged> event occurs when the MappingName value changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingNameChanged>evento ocorre quando o valor de MappingName alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingNameChanged>

trans-unit.source: The name used to map this grid to a specific data source.
trans-unit.target: O nome usado para mapear essa grade para uma fonte de dados específico.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width used to create columns when a new grid is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura usada para criar colunas quando uma nova grade será exibida.

trans-unit.source: The width used to create columns when a new grid is displayed.
trans-unit.target: A largura usada para criar colunas quando uma nova grade será exibida.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*>alterações de valor de propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredColumnWidth*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height used to create a row when a new grid is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a altura usada para criar uma linha quando uma nova grade será exibida.

trans-unit.source: The preferred height is the minimum height needed to accommodate the displayed text with the assigned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A altura preferencial é a altura mínima necessária para acomodar o texto exibido com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.HeaderFont%2A> atribuído

trans-unit.source: A row will not be created with a height less than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Uma linha não será criada com uma altura menor que o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: If the font size requires it, however, the row height may be greater than the specified value.
trans-unit.target: Se o tamanho da fonte exigir, no entanto, a altura da linha pode ser maior que o valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The height of a row, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: A altura de uma linha, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight*> value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight*>o valor é alterado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.PreferredRowHeight*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether columns can be edited.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as colunas podem ser editadas.

trans-unit.source: You can also specify whether individual columns within the table are editable by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an appropriate value, `true` or `false`.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode especificar se as colunas individuais dentro da tabela são editáveis, definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>da classe <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para um valor apropriado, `true` ou `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, to ensure that the data is not edited, you can set the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> class's <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, para garantir que os dados não são editados, você pode definir o <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>da classe <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ReadOnly%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataColumn>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if columns cannot be edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se colunas não podem ser editadas; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether row headers are visible.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os cabeçalhos de linha são visíveis.

trans-unit.source: When row headers are visible, a plus sign is displayed in each row header if the underlying <xref:System.Data.DataTable> has a related child table.
trans-unit.target: Quando os cabeçalhos de linha estão visíveis, um sinal de adição é exibido em cada cabeçalho de linha se subjacente <xref:System.Data.DataTable>tem uma tabela filho relacionados.</xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: This property will not function until you add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não funcionará até você adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>objetos a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>

trans-unit.source: Until then, setting this property will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: Até lá, a definição dessa propriedade não terá efeito.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if row headers are visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os cabeçalhos de linha são visíveis; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
